articles.title: Apple shipped its 3 billionth iPhone
articles.description: Apple has been the target of a fair amount of criticism over the past year, from its AI missteps to a strong distaste for its new design ethos. articles.description: Apple CEO Tim Cook says the company is “open” to mergers and acquisitions as it “significantly” increases its investment in AI, as reported by CNBC.
